result.execSummary:
Larry R Daniels was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Larry R Daniels was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

of Remand
Copy of minutes from EH Hrg on 9/8/22 sent electronically to DCJ
for Larry Daniesl re: Extradition Hearing on 8.22.22 @ 10:30am // USPS RTS, Not Deliverable as Addressed
Letter Requesting Extension to File Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus
Governor's Warrant

11:33 AM Defendant Larry R Daniels in court, in custody with Attorney Will Anderson who appeared on behalf of Attorney Paul M Fredrickson.  Attorney Paul W. Humphrey in court for Plaintiff State of Wisconsin.   RE:  90-day Extradition Hearing (976.03(10).  ADA Humphrey indicates original Gov Warrant has been served on Defn.  Court's colloquy with Defn.  Defn makes stmt contesting fugitive status; and Atty Anderson indicates Defn wishes to test validity of warrant.  Court grants reasonable time for Defn to file writ of habeas corpus;  by end of day on Monday Sept 12th; State will be allowed to respond.  ADA Humphrey indicates the writ may not be filed with Br 4; civil proceeding.  Suggests Ct sign extradition order but hold until decision made on habeas issue; would eliminate need for another hearing.
Extradition hearing on September 8, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Documentation provided to the Court regarding Covid; via email from Atty Anderson and audio attachment.  Accepted by the Court; warrant to be quashed.
Body Only

9:52 AM  Attorney Paul Humphrey appears in court on behalf of State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Will Rice Anderson appeared in court on behalf of Attorney Paul Frederickson for Defendant Larry R Daniels who does not appear.  ADA Humphrey states he has governor's warrant but understand Defn has covid.  Requesting bench warrant unless verification of positive test is provided.  Discn on record.  Court grants request and issues bench warrant; however, if positive test and documentation are provided, bench warrant will be quashed and today's hearing will be rescheduled.
Extradition hearing on August 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.  **DEFN'S PREVIOUS NOH WAS RETURNED; SENT NEW NOH TO ADDRESS PROVIDED BY ATTY**

ADDRESS INFO for Larry R Daniels
Current: c/o  The Beacon, 615 E. Washington Avenue, Madison, WI 53703 United States  (Effective: 08-10-2022)
Prior: 115 W. Doty Street, c/o  Dane County Jail, Madison, WI 53703 United States
Notice of Hearing for Larry R. Daniels re: 8.22.22 Extradition Hearing // Returned from DCJ no forwarding address provided

and returned.
Copy of minutes from BBH Hrg on 6/15/22 and bond form sent electronically to DCJ.
Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.

02:07 PM  Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Paul M Fredrickson.  Attorney Timothy Helmberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  ADA Helmberger provides status on extradition matter; State of IL is still wishing to pursue extradition but they have not rec'd Governor's Warrant.  State requests 60-day extension with matter being set for Extradition Hrg in approx 60 days.  No objection.  So granted.
Extradition hearing on August 11, 2022 at 11:30 am.

02:07 PM  Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Paul M Fredrickson.  Attorney Timothy Helmberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Fredrickson presents argument for bail modification from cash bond to signature bond.  State presents argument against signature bond; but agrees to reduction of cash bond to $500.  Response by Atty Frederickson.  Court grants request for signature bond; previous conditions remain in effect.
Bail/bond hearing on June 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
for Modification of Bail Conditions

03:06 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Amy M Johnson.  Cecilia E DeMarco appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties by Zoom.  Defendant given copy of fugitive warrant and requested a hearing.  Extradition hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  File Review scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 09:30 am.
